even tho its not correct usage, why stackoverflow? trace in reply
```using ModelingToolkit, OrdinaryDiffEq
@parameters t, r
@variables x(t)
D = Differential(t)
eq = D(x) ~ 1 + r*x + x^2 
one = ODESystem([eq], name=:one)
EnsembleProblem(one, -1:0.01:1)```
